website_summaries.verdict: This classic-style table has plenty of drawers and cupboards for storage.
pros: A great solid wood table with convincing cherry veneers
This piece can add flavor to any dining or living room
Measures 42 inches wide by 12 inches deep by 31 inches high
cons: It can be difficult to store plates and larger items in the shallow cabinets

customer_reviews.title: Stunningly Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Stunningly beautiful! Assembly is not for the weak skilled person. Took me several hours to assemble and you definitely need 4 hands! Watch out when you open the box - there's ALOT of Styrofoam! - But this was by far a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jess R. Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.text: This is in my entrance way, and I get compliments on it from everyone the first time they come into the house. It looks beautiful, is true to the picture, and size. It recommends two people are needed to assemble it, but I did it by myself. Lay out all the parts, read all the directions first, and become familiar with the process. It's easy to assemble; you just need to take your time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Than You Think BUT....
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived in two days. A good Saturday project. Took my time. Cleaned off the fibers and Styrofoam as other reviewers mentioned (thank you for the feedback, you were right). Laid out the parts, pieces numerically. Good game plan. One Philips head screwdrivers and some patience and was put together in less than two hours. No missing parts. Everything fit like it should. A we are happy. Very nice cherry finish. Small but petite which is actually what we needed in an already crowded kitchen. We are very happy with our purchase. Thanks again for our previous reviewers helping make our decision an easy one. Hope my review will help others make their decision to go for it or not.
customer_reviews.author: JeffG

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: This looks better than we expected, great value for the price. Simple assembly took about 1/2 hour. We get a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Snowman 5

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't pay me enough to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Too many parts to put together and too many misaligned and when console was finished top center drawer was difficult to open as one side was longer. The two doors were difficult to open and and would not open individually. My daughter who is very adept had difficulty with the putting this item together due to some sections had parts that were longer or shorter than they were supposed to be. I would not recommend this item at all. Not worth the hassle or the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ogie

customer_reviews.title: it scratches easily, and rubs off fairly easily
customer_reviews.text: Now that it is completely assembled, it's a cute side board. But I found the assembly very time consuming, it took me about 4 hours but I put it together alone and that probably made it more difficult. The cabinet doors were particular difficult to align and put on but I finally got it right. The finish is fragile, it scratches easily, and rubs off fairly easily. Had to do over again, I think I would look for an assembled side board for a similar price but now that it is done, it's cute and will serve it's purpose as purely decorative in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Judd

customer_reviews.title: VERY PRETTY
customer_reviews.text: I ORDERED THIS IN A CHERRY FINISH, VERY PRETTY, PUT IT TOGETHER IN ABOUT 1 1/2 HOURS, IT IS A PERFECT FIT FOR MY SMALL LIVING ROOM, ALTHOUGH I DID CHANGE THE KNOBS TO BRASS MOCK KEYS AND VICTORIAN BACK PLATES, MADE THE PIECE LOOK ANTIQUE WHICH WAS THE LOOK I NEEDED. I LOVE IT!, AND GET COMPLIMENTS.
customer_reviews.author: SARAH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Buffet, Excellent Price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandmother because she needed more storage and I wanted something that was nice, but not too expensive. After shopping at several furniture stores and online shops, I decided to give this one a try. I had it shipped to my house so I could put it together before delivering to Granny. I put the entire unit together by myself, which shocked my husband! Now, I would not recommend that for everyone, but I consider myself to be skilled with tools and directions. Ideally, two people should attempt this, take your time and it will turn out great. Granny loves this buffet and brags about it to everyone who comes over.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Riley

customer_reviews.title: but amazing quality. Photos are very misleading (I'm learning that ...
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously small, but amazing quality. Photos are very misleading (I'm learning that regarding buying furniture via internet) but I can't argue the quality of this. In low lighting, it looks like a dark espresso finish but in normally lighting it has a beauty dark cherry wood appearance. Size sucks but everything else is great. Putting together was REALLY a blessing on how easy and straight forward they made it to be. THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Very nice buffet, but it’s also narrow
customer_reviews.text: Very nice buffet, but it’s also narrow, regular size dinner plate will not fit in it. But over all it’s nice.
customer_reviews.author: Velecia brown

customer_reviews.title: Looks very classy!
customer_reviews.text: It did take me about 5 hours to put this together, but it is worth the work. I'm a 60-something single woman who has always enjoyed handy-work, so it might take someone who has more experience (or who is younger!) less time, but the directions are relatively clear and easy to follow. One of the hardest parts was opening the shipping crate! It was so tightly fastened together, I thought I might need to dynamite it to get it open! However, that meant there was no damage to the parts inside, so once it was opened, I was glad it was so well protected.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Directions are precise and that helps a lot. I did like the cam locks! That made it easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this little cabinet. It is small like a console table for a small entryway. In my case I need it for the ladies restroom to put paper towels in at church. Great quality for the price. Dark cherry finish is beautiful and classy. Love the real wood laminate not fake stuff that peels off. I was able to put it together in 3 hours. This is a great buy and for the money its hard to beat! Very lovely cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Crowell

customer_reviews.title: Sadly this piece looks like doll furniture
customer_reviews.text: This piece was not at all what I expected. It was very small and could not store much of anything. I had to pay about $150 to have it assembled, it took the tech several hours as it had so many pieces. When I inquired about returning it, I kept being told to send it back in the packaging it came in - which was impossible once assembled. Amazon refunded the cost of the piece which I appreciate but not the cost of assembly which was significant.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Marcuse

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it looks and the sturdiness. It was easy to assemble. It took me about 2 hours to assemble by myself. All the parts were there with clear diagrams for assembly. It looks exactly as I expected. It is a perfect fit for me as I use it for keeping items out of sight. It would not work for storage of plates as it is not that wide. I would definitely purchase this item again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Boyd

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy, attractive, and functional piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: We live in a small home, it fits in our living room, with an oval mirror above it's got an old fashioned look. This piece give us needed storage and is very attractive. Don't listen to whiners down it because they don't have the patience and care to assemble it properly. Don't forget to buy adhesive pads for the 'feet' so you can slide the little beast around. We have tile. Carpets no need.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Masters

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece! Took 2 hours to assemble by myself, but so worth it I now have a beautiful tea cabinet in my bedroom instead of a cluttered, bookcase
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great when you need a smaller piece, but not grand.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and works great in an area with limited space where an attractive extra surface and storage are needed. Does not make much of a statement though so I don't recommend for an actual foyer, I think you'd want a bigger piece. Still, along my wall in a place with a bit narrower through way it works great.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful cabinet that adds elegance to the house
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful piece of furniture. The assembly of the cabinet went very smoothly due to the exceptional instructions and architectural design we lived this piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: jcv: a great product especially the display

customer_reviews.title: the locking bolts are very poorly made and feels like a thin aluminum
customer_reviews.text: This is not what i expected. the product seems really badly made. the screw holes that are pre-drilled in the wood are not actually drilled, rather separately installed (maybe with glue and couple of them came off as I was installing them. the locking bolts are very poorly made and feels like a thin aluminum. The color is as you see (not polished), it gives a rough and cheap look. I probably have to paint it my self. Hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: kazihasan

customer_reviews.title: This item looks like described. Overall very cute
customer_reviews.text: This item looks like described. Overall very cute. Assembly has good directions, but takes a lot of time. It is a a lot of little pieces to put together, and this is the first time in my life that I could not finish it in one approach. It is a small piece of furniture, should be sold assembled. Can fit in a relatively small box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as an accent piece for the entry. Well packed. assembly instructions were pretty good. Had an extra screw or two, could come in handy. Took two hours to assemble (think IKEA). The actual color is darker than I expected, almost black. Not a bad piece, not an heirloom piece either.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA OWENS

customer_reviews.title: very nice, not too hard to put together but does ...
customer_reviews.text: very nice, not too hard to put together but does take some work, my man put it together and he had not problem.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: I love it! The kit was very well packaged
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The kit was very well packaged, and I was very impressed with how organized the instructions were. Every piece had a label to make constructing the piece as easy as possible. It is advisable to have two putting it together. It would be difficult with one person at the start. It is perfect for my entry, but would be nice in any room.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J. Glassey

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: We received the item in the best packaging I have ever seen. The instructions were very easy and we were able to complete in a little less than 2 hours. I had hoped to store china dinner plates horizontally, but the inside of the cabinet is too narrow so I purchased a plate rack for vertical storage that should work. It is a pretty dark stain and does not quite go with other furniture in the room, but it sort of adds character. The back is very flimsy, but for the price, that is no surprise. We were not wild about the knobs so may look around for something else; however, we are overall very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia R. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: King's Brand Wood Console
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and elegant and made of really good materials. Love the deep rich color of the wood. Not flimsy at all. Very Sturdy. Looks great in my living room. Didn't take a lot of time to put together. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenae

customer_reviews.title: This was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money... Very difficult to put together. Wood dowels broke off. Could not return it because the box was discarded with Christmas stuff. It has set in the corner of my living room almost a year now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Small Sideboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice dining room sideboard. Assembly took a while, but once complete looks good on our small dining room & serves intended purpose. Doesn't take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to my traditional decor
customer_reviews.text: The console is perfect for our entry way, which enters directly into our living and dining rooms. It complements the traditional cherry wood decor perfectly! Really like it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant - Pefect for my purposes.
customer_reviews.text: I made purchase of this piece, for a location with little space - It fits perfectly and is beautiful, too.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. EMD

customer_reviews.title: Best build it yourself furniture I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best build it yourself furniture I have ever had. Great quality. Simple instructions. They even give you one extra of every piece of hardware just in case. I’m sticking with kings brand from now on
customer_reviews.author: Donna Colby

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly, easy to assemble although it took about 3 hours, looks pretty nice, seems sturdy and the finish was okay although the wood grain does not show as well as I would like. I think it is worth the money and that cannot be said for a lot of furniture I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and so much nicer than I expected for the price. It looks beautiful put together for a fraction of what I expected to spend for a higher end (or antique) sideboard. I'm so glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The doors on the left have an inch gap. It look strange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It serves the purpose for which I purchased it.
customer_reviews.text: I like everything except the backing, which is very thin with two pieces stuck together with tape.
customer_reviews.author: Elnora Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks real nice, but be aware it's a lot of assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it and fit my living room, but accessories include ware shortage in bags ship....crews, nails and nuts...???....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and perfect size for my dining room area
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice piece. However
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece. However, the center door hinge had 2 top hinges and no bottom hinge. I could not find a customer service number on any of the paperwork. Had to have one custom made.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this console table
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this console table. It holds our games well as well as our flower vases and our tea and cards in the drawers. it isn't too bulky which is a plus in my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I really thought it would be a better piece. Now I am trying to get rid ...
customer_reviews.text: this truly was a rip off. When they quoted the original price as 599, I really thought it would be a better piece. Now I am trying to get rid of it. Sorry I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Treemi

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I was looking for. I needed a small cabinet and this is perfect. Looks great and the quality is really good! Arrived quickly; not too difficult to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Telka

customer_reviews.title: Only made one change.
customer_reviews.text: We received it in good shape. It went together easily. I changed the draw limiters to below the draw instead of inside top like it came. Looks good and serves it's purpose for us.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Tom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure I would have spent so much if I realized how small it really was, but over all this is a beautiful, sturdy hallway table. I am very happy with this product and easy to understand instructions
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, reasonably priced and it looks like a high-end piece of furniture! LOVE IT! I put it under my 50" Flatscreen that's mounted on the wall to hide the wires. It's a deep cherry red color, and just ornate enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie St James

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece. Looks like cherry. Beautiful scrolling. Placed in a foyer. Narrow enough to be out of the way of double door opening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this, doing a makeover in our house. Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Shirley N. Panick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colour works in perfectly with dining room where I ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colour works in perfectly with dining room where I have it. It took me about 2 hours to put together. I think it would have taken less time if I had some help. Every part was well package and had no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: we use these to put our Nutrisystem stuff in... instead of the ugly cardboard boxes they come in (the nutrisystem ones)... Easy to set up... I have mobility issues and was able to do it with no issues
customer_reviews.author: Arlene35

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this furniture, it fits very well with my dining room set. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sepe

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice in the dining room but is not as deep as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Anita O

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful console
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 55 year old 5 ft tall woman. I assembled this thing myself. Took about 4 hours, but was well worth the effort. It's heavy, sturdy and well made. It looks like a really expensive piece of furniture. If you're on the fence on this one, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: Just Beautiful, Functional and Well Packaged
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something I can store my keys, put chargers and mail sorter as I enter my house. Something that is compact but has the drawers and cabinets to hold my things. This console took care of all my needs. After reading other reviews I was a little worried about the assembly but it wasn't as bad and I assembled the entire thing by myself in less then 2 hours but I am pretty handy. I also liked the way the product was packaged with a heavy card board boarder around the box for extra protection.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly right and looks great. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My office has a very small conference room and we needed a small cabinet there. This is exactly right and looks great. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: subuyer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble all by myself
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble all by myself. Looks very nice in my dining room. Not a large item, but this is what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Judith T.

customer_reviews.title: King Wood Console table
customer_reviews.text: I needed a console to put behind a couch- and this is a perfect size. There are 3 drawers and 3 cabinets- so it has good storage. It is well made. As noted, it takes time to put together as it comes all in parts. The wood has a very dark stain, I would have preferred more of a cherry stain look- but I do like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: KitBry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: We have this in our entryway now. It was not hard to put together and it truly looks more expensive than it is. Very nice piece of furniture. So glad we bought this! Ours is a cherry tone. The 3 drawers in the top are great for storing mittens/sunhats/sunglasses for the kids. We use the bottom shelves for extra hats and gloves. Very functional and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: DDS

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Lots of pieces, but easy to assemble. Took about 2 hours by myself.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Small Buffett for Apartments Use
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of apartment size furniture to store linens and other items.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Scrapper

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. It has tons of pieces that took me 3 hours to put together by myself. The directions are both diagrams and words and quite easy just tme consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Illies

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! Need a little patience for assembly, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is not worth it. It is so small it belongs in a doll house. Very cheap back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy instructions, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 5"2" 120lb (fine. give or take 10lbs) chick that put this thing together in about 2.5 hours, alone, with no problems. The instructions are clear and well written. I have NO experience with putting things together and I had no problem with this. It looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Tori Ann

customer_reviews.title: A real conversation piece.
customer_reviews.text: So many of your friends can not believe we have purchased so many of our new pieces from pictures on the Internet. It is so exciting when we reassure we picked it from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: keating43

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not great but not bad. We returned it since it was almost purple. Not the color we expected
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: Looks Antique
customer_reviews.text: Sits in a corner of my dining room, I use it for a sideboard. My room is quite small, so it fits in perfect and provides me with some much needed storage. No problem putting together.
customer_reviews.author: Maraya

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: I am completely satisfied with this product. This product was as described and it looks beautiful in my entry way in my home! I've gotten so many compliments on how beautiful this console looks!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Couple hours worth of work needed to put it all together.It is very elegant, and utilitarian as well.
customer_reviews.author: gadget_fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful cabinet. No problem putting it together and it looks very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: classy,small furniture
customer_reviews.text: Love it, small enough, and classy enough. Lot of pieces, but my friend loves a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: mildred

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy. Wouldn't buy kings brand again
customer_reviews.text: Uneven "stain" color. Just looks pain awful. Not very sturdy. Wouldn't buy kings brand again.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: A nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: A nice piece of furniture, but the top had a scratch that I didn't see until the last step of assembly. Overall, it looks nice and of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice Sideboard for the money
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to put together and it looks nice. Not the highest quality but for the price I thing it is very good. It fits nice in my Dinning room and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Cassi

customer_reviews.title: Really great looking and not too wide to boot
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a Mother's day gift, Mostly to hold recipe books, Perfect as it fits under a standard window sill height and being only 12 in. doesn't protrude into walk area.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my accent table. Have gotten many comments on how pretty it is.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn  Morgan

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful piece. My only objection was when I reviewed ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece. My only objection was when I reviewed the directions and right across the front it says that it is recommended that 2 adults put it together. I did it alone and it came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: This console was perfect for what I was looking for. It was the only console that I could find that is narrow, longer than 3ft and has storage cabinets. It came in very good packaging, so the wood was in perfect condition. The console is made of real wood and not composite material. The assembly process was easy because all the holes were pre-drilled perfectly but it did take over 2 hours to put this together. Overall, this is a great product and it looks more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ong

customer_reviews.title: Good Product. Assembly Required
customer_reviews.text: Product is very well packaged and documented. Assembly instructions are enough for folks used to assemble products. Else they are short. It will take 2-3 hours to put it all together. Assembled product looks good. Wood is of reasonably good quality. Note wood is thin as product is small in width. It is very good for short hallways. It was perfect for me with these dimensions. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pravin Pathak

customer_reviews.title: Love it, just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Love it, just what I was looking for. Beautiful cherry finish fits in perfectly with the original wood trim in this old house!
customer_reviews.author: B Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, excellent assembly instructions. Fit the space perfectly. Note it is narrower than similar cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: quite satisfied with this
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with this piece of furniture. It looks nice in my entry hall. The construction, materials, directions for assembly, and finish are all satisfactory. I can recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Salsadancer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect entry way piece doubles as serving bar for entertaining ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect entry way piece doubles as serving bar for entertaining lots if room to store additional china or serving pieces without taking up too much space. The rich cherry finish compliments any room with timeless style.
customer_reviews.author: Linda tubens

customer_reviews.title: looks nice but the doors don't meet
customer_reviews.text: This was relatively easy for two adults to put together, and it does look nice but two of the doors do not meet. I've placed it behind a chair, so I don't really care, but if you will have this in open space and use it for storage keep in mind that part of the interior is visible.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and more expensive tha it really is!
customer_reviews.author: REDVETTEGODDESS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece and a awesome addition to the dining room ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece and a awesome addition to the dining room with the corner curio china cabinets that also purchased.
customer_reviews.author: The Family!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sideboard table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sideboard table. I reversed back panel - bored two more holes - as table is used as divider between hallway and livingroom. Five stars
customer_reviews.author: kevin oconnell

customer_reviews.title: Side Bar
customer_reviews.text: It was missing the back of one drawer piece. Amazon sent out another one real quick, so no problem there. It was smaller than I thought but other than that it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Houston Texan

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Lovely piece that sits nicely on a small wall near our back door. The look of the wood is very rich; the ample storage it provides is nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: M. Grizzaffi

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Nice piece with pretty good storage. Easy to put together. Everything came packaged properly with no scratches or damage.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THIS LOOKS GOOD IN MY HOME AND I LIKE IT
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: This is a very pretty piece and will work well
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty piece and will work well. It is rather small which is my own fault for not looking at the measurements. I didn't personally put it together but was told it was a little time consuming but not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: toni baker

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little storage cabinet for the price but i wouldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little storage cabinet for the price but i wouldn't pay any more than I did. It is really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product. . But it comes in a million peices.. I hope your looking for a career in furniture building
customer_reviews.author: Randall Lloyd Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product quality is really nice, you have to put it together though so be ready!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Good but too dark
customer_reviews.text: It is a well made piece of assemble yourself furniture. It is extremely dark for "Cherrywood" almost an ebony, I originally thought I had been sent the wrong item. With a bright light you can see the red but it is too dark to be called Cherry.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B. Bales

customer_reviews.title: Sideboard table a good fit
customer_reviews.text: The sideboard table works well for our family to store some china items. It was not difficult to assemble. All parts arrived well packed and the directions were easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas L. Hamnes

customer_reviews.title: This Console Looks Better In Person!
customer_reviews.text: It wasnt very hard to put together. It took my husband about 30 minutes to put it all together. Instructions are very clear and Console is beautiful! Didn't have a single problem with it! I recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: James Climmons

customer_reviews.title: This table works fine and looks fine
customer_reviews.text: We needed a entry table to accent the vintage 56 inch wide mirror hanging above it. This table works fine and looks fine. I wish that the color were just a little lighter (not black cherry). But I knew that it would probably be very dark and,other than that, it serves the purpose. Assembly revealed a problem: a hole had not been drilled for a cam lock. I had to very carefully drill and ream the hole to fit the cam lock into. Overall, We are satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Duane R. Price

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the money. A good fit for under the tv and sound bar. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: argo

customer_reviews.title: Sideboard Table from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This Console is so handy. It is just the right size to sit under a wall mounted TV. Has just the right size storage for DVD's, remotes, even sound accessories. Goes together well and a high quality durable finish. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: fast shipping and satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It took me three hours to assemble this piece. It looks exactly like the picture, and I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: zebrafish

product_meta.title: King's Brand Wood Console Sideboard Table with Drawers and Storage, Cherry Finish
feature_bullets: Console sideboard table with drawers and storage
Made of solid wood with wood veneer; consists of 3 drawers and 3 doors with shelves behind the doors
Features antique brass knobs, turning post/legs with accents on the drawer and door panels
Measures 42-inch length by 12-inch width by 31-inch height
